questions.text: Does a driver commit an offence if he/she lets a person who does not hold the relevant driving licence drive the motor vehicle?

answers.text: yes
no

questions.text: Does a driver commit an offence if he/she exceeds the permissible speed limit although this does not create any immediate danger to the traffic?

answers.text: yes
no

questions.text: Does a driver make a violation, when running without lights switched on?

answers.text: Yes
No

questions.text: Does a driver commit an offence if he/she, during overtaking, causes the road vehicle being overtaken to alter its direction of movement?

answers.text: yes
no

questions.text: Does a driver commit an offence if he/she leaves or scatters objects on the road?

answers.text: yes, in all cases when this has created a danger to the traffic
yes, but only if this has resulted in a road traffic accident
no, because the driver is not responsible for the cargo being transported

questions.text: Does a driver commit an offence if he/she drives a motor vehicle without registration plates?

answers.text: yes
no

questions.text: Is it an offense to drive a motor vehicle with a registration plate that is obscured by any materials or substances?

answers.text: yes
no

questions.text: Does a driver commit an offence if he/she drives a motor vehicle with a technical failure which he/she does not own?

answers.text: yes
no

questions.text: Does a driver commit an offence if he/she drives a motor vehicle in the immediate vicinity of his/her home, without carrying his/her driving licence?

answers.text: yes
no

questions.text: Does a driver commit an offence if he/she drives a motor vehicle with a sound signalling equipment having a failure?

answers.text: yes
no

questions.text: Does a driver commit an offence if he/she refuses to be checked by the control authorities for alcohol consumption?

answers.text: yes
no

questions.text: Does a driver commit an offence if he/she lets a person who is under the influence of alcohol drive the motor vehicle?

answers.text: yes
no

questions.text: Does a driver commit an offence if, while outside a populated area, he/she does not signalize a vehicle which has been forced to stop on the driveway?

answers.text: no
yes

questions.text: Does a driver commit an offence if he/she does not duly signalize a motor vehicle which has been forced to stop on the driveway?

answers.text: no, unless this has resulted in a road traffic accident
yes, but only if this has created a danger to the traffic
yes, in all cases, irrespective of the consequences

questions.text: A driver who has exceeded the speed limit outside the populated area with more than 50 km/h will be deprived of the right to drive motor vehicles:

answers.text: When the offense is repeated systematically
In all cases

questions.text: A driver who has exceeded the permissible maximum speed in a populated area by over 50 km/h will be:

answers.text: only fined
only deprived of the right to drive a motor vehicle
fined and deprived of the right to drive a motor vehicle

questions.text: A driver who does not carry the necessary documents will be:

answers.text: fined
sanctioned with a test
deprived of the right to drive a motor vehicle

questions.text: A driver of a motor vehicle who violates the rules of using the lights while driving will be punished:

answers.text: in all cases
only if this has resulted in a road traffic accident
only if this has created an immediate danger to the traffic

questions.text: The control authorities will temporarily revoke the driving licence of a driver of a motor vehicle:

answers.text: who, on the basis of a visual check, is found not to meet the medical requirements
who is driving a motor vehicle with alcohol concentration in the blood over 0,5 per thousand
who, due to lack of knowledge, has committed a significant violation of the road traffic rules
when the motor vehicle has technical failures

questions.text: The control authorities will temporarily revoke the driving licence of a driver of a motor vehicle:

answers.text: who refuses to be checked by the control authorities for presence of alcohol in the blood
who, due to lack of knowledge, has committed a significant violation of the road traffic rules
who drives a motor vehicle without a civil liability insurance
if the required vignette fee has not been paid

questions.text: The control authorities will temporarily revoke the driving licence of a driver of a motor vehicle:

answers.text: who, on the basis of a visual check, is found not to meet the medical requirements
who, on the basis of a visual check, is found not to meet the psychological requirements
if the driver parks the vehicle on a place where parking is prohibited
if the required vignette fee has not been paid

questions.text: The control authorities will temporary suspend the motor vehicle driving license of a driver who:

answers.text: Is driving a motor vehicle with alcohol concentration in the blood above 0.5 per mille
Is driving a motor vehicle under the impact of a narcotic substance
Refuses to pass a test for the presence of alcohol in the blood conducted by the control authorities
Has parked the vehicle at a place where parking is prohibited

questions.text: What measure should be taken against a driver who, due to a lack of knowledge, has committed a non-minor violation of the road traffic rules?

answers.text: temporary revocation of the driving licence
impose a fine of up to BGN 300
the motor vehicle of the driver will be temporarily stopped

questions.text: The control authorities will temporarily decommission a motor vehicle whose owner:

answers.text: allows other persons driving the motor vehicle for unauthorized car races on public roads;
exceeds the speed limit in a populated area with more than 50 km/h
does not have the mandatory "Third person liability" insurance of drivers
due to ignorance, has committed a non-minor violation of the traffic rules

questions.text: A motor vehicle shall be stopped temporary from movement when:

answers.text: It is technically unfit
The content of harmful substances in the exhaust gas is above the established norms
It is with removed silencers
Its driver refuses to be tested by the control bodies for presence of alcohol in the blood

questions.text: What measures will be applied in case of driving a motor vehicle without a Civil Liability insurance?

answers.text: temporary stopping of the motor vehicle and temporary revocation of the driving licence of the motor vehicle’s driver
only temporary stopping of the motor vehicle
only temporary revocation of the driving licence of the motor vehicle’s driver

questions.text: The control authorities will move a parked road vehicle without the knowledge of its owner, if the vehicle:

answers.text: makes it impossible for the other road users to pass
creates a danger for the other road users
is without registration plates placed on the specified places
always, if parked in violation of the road traffic rules

questions.text: The control authorities will move a parked road vehicle without the knowledge of its owner, if the vehicle:

answers.text: is properly parked, but its movement to another place is required by the circumstances
is parked in violation of the rules, on a place designated by a stationary road sign warning of compulsory movement
creates a danger for the other road users
always, if parked in violation of the road traffic rules

questions.text: If a traffic ticket is issued for an established violation, but the person who has committed the violation refuses to sign the traffic ticket:

answers.text: a protocol is drawn up
the traffic ticket is signed by two witnesses
a fine is imposed on the spot, based on a receipt

questions.text: If, in case of violation, the driver does not agree with the fine which has been specified, may the driver refuse to be issued a traffic ticket?

answers.text: yes
no

questions.text: In case of administrative offences established at the time they are committed, a fine shall be imposed on the driver, and the amount of the fine will be:

answers.text: within the minimum amount, or within the amount specified in the administrative provision for the relevant offence
determined by the traffic police officer
within the maximum amount which can be imposed for that offence
within the average amount which can be imposed for that offence

questions.text: Administrative offenses established at the time they are committed can be imposed with a fine ticket if:

answers.text: The offense is not punishable by deprivation of the right to drive a motor vehicle
The offense is not punishable by deduction of control points
The offense is not punishable by compulsory revocation of the motor vehicle’s registration
The offense is not punishable by a temporary decommissioning of the motor vehicle

questions.text: For an administrative violation, established and photographed with an automated technical device, a fine may be imposed with an electronic slip, when:

answers.text: the violation is not provided for deprivation of the right to drive a motor vehicle
the violation is not provided for withdrawal of control points
the violation is not provided for official termination of the registration of the motor vehicle
the violation is not provided for suspension of the motor vehicle

questions.text: When the violation is established and photographed with an automated technical device in the absence of a control authority and a violator, a fine with an electronic slip may be imposed:

answers.text: true
false

questions.text: The driver challenges the violation he/she has committed indicated by the control authority

answers.text: the driver does not agree that he/she has committed the violation specified by the control authorities
The driver does not agree with the the size of the fine imposed
The driver refuses to sign the fine ticket
Always when the imposed fine is above BGN 20 (twenty)

questions.text: Is a parking violation ticket considered delivered if it has been issued in the absence of the driver and a notice that such a ticket is issued has been affixed to the motor vehicle?

answers.text: yes
no

questions.text: A driver who has been deprived of all control points:

answers.text: loses his/her legal right to drive a motor vehicle
is obliged to return his/her driving licence to the Ministry of Interior
may keep the driving licence if he/she attends a test immediately
is only obliged to inform the control authorities of the Ministry of Interior

questions.text: When a passenger in a passenger car does not observe the obligation to use a seat belt, the penalty is imposed on?

answers.text: the unbelted passenger and the driver of the car
the unbelted passenger only
the driver of the car only

questions.text: In case of violation, found and captured with technical means, in the absence of a control body and the violator, the issued electronic ticket:

answers.text: Shall be subject to appeal
Shall not be subject to appeal, when the fine imposed is up to 50 levs, including
Shall be subject to appeal, only when the automobile is driven by the owner

questions.text: In case of payment of a fine for committed violation, imposed by an electronic ticket within 14 days of receipt of the ticket:

answers.text: Shall be paid 70% of the amount of the fine
Shall be paid the full amount of the fine
Shall be paid 50% of the amount of the fine

questions.text: In case of a violation, found and captured with technical means, in the absence of a control body and the violator, the electronic ticket is issued to the owner of the vehicle, when:

answers.text: The violation is committed by the owner
When he does not submit a written statement with data of the person who has committed the violation, and a copy of his driving certificate
Always, when the owner has provided power of attorney to other persons for driving the vehicle

questions.text: In case of entered into force two penalty decrees (for a period of one year) for passing at signal of the traffic lights, which does not allows passing, the driver shall be punished:

answers.text: With a fine and depriving from the right of driving
Only with a fine
Only with depriving from the right of driving

questions.text: What punishment is imposed to a driver, when for a period of one year he has two entered into force penalty decrees for failure to provide priority to pedestrians on a pedestrian crossing?

answers.text: With a fine and depriving from the right of driving
Only with a fine
Only with depriving from the right of driving

questions.text: Is a driver subject to a punishment, when without having this right, parks on a space designated for a vehicle serving people with permanent disabilities?

answers.text: Yes
No
No, except in cases when the vehicle is parked at this location during the night

questions.text: In which cases the competent bodies does not issue a duplicate of the driving license for driving a vehicle?

answers.text: When the driver has not paid in full the due fines
When the certificate is lost
When the certificate is stolen

questions.text: Control authorities temporarily suspend the registration of a motor vehicle of an owner who drives a motor vehicle:

answers.text: with alcohol concentration in the blood above 0.5 per thousand
did not fulfil the prescription for a medical examination to determine the concentration of alcohol in the blood or the use of narcotic substances or their analogues
refuses to pass a test with a technical device to establish the alcohol blood concentration or the use of narcotic substances or their analogues
and exceeds the maximum permitted speed in a populated place by more than 50 km/h

questions.text: The control authorities will temporarily decommission a motor vehicle whose owner:

answers.text: Drives the motor vehicle without possessing the appropriate driving license;
Fails to obey the instruction to have a medical test to establish the blood alcohol concentration
Allows or grants driving of a motor vehicle to a person who does not possess the appropriate driving license
Allows or grants driving of a motor vehicle to a person with alcohol concentration in the blood above 0.5 per mile

questions.text: The control authorities revoke the registration of a vehicle whose owner drives a motor vehicle:

answers.text: Without possessing the appropriate driving license
With alcohol concentration in the blood above 0.5 per mille
Under the influence of narcotic substances or their intoxicating analogues
Has imposed fine, that is unpaid within the period for voluntary payment

questions.text: The control authorities revoke the registration of a road vehicle whose owner being the driver of a motor vehicle:

answers.text: Refuses to pass a test with a technical device to establish the use of alcohol
Fails to obey the instruction to have a medical test conducted to establish the use of narcotic substances
Exceeds the speed limit in a populated area with more than 50 km/h
Takes part in unauthorized car races on public roads

questions.text: The control authorities shall terminate the registration of a motor vehicle of an owner:

answers.text: who, as a driver, refuses to be tested with a technical device to establish the use of alcohol
whose motor vehicle is driven by a person who does not own the required suitable driving license
exceed the maximum permitted speed in a populated area above 50 km/h
participates in unregulated race competitions on the roads open for public use

questions.text: The control authorities shall not allow a motor vehicle to be driven by a driver if during a roadside check it is found that the driver:

answers.text: Does not possess the appropriate driving license
Has alcohol concentration in his/her blood above 0.5 per mille
Is under the influence of a narcotic substance
Has not paid the mandatory Third Party Liability insurance

questions.text: The control authorities shall not allow a motor vehicle to be driven by a driver who:

answers.text: Has not paid the mandatory Third Party Liability insurance
Refuses to pass a test with a technical device to establish the use of alcohol
Fails to obey the instruction to have a medical test conducted to establish the use of narcotic substances

questions.text: In the case of revocation of the vehicle’s registration by the authorities at the time of issuing the statement for the administrative violation the following items are confiscated:

answers.text: The registration plates
Part 2 of the motor vehicle registration certificate
Part 1 of the motor vehicle registration certificate

questions.text: What is the sanction for a driver who drives into oncoming traffic of motorway and/or expressway:

answers.text: Only a fine
Only deprivation of the right to drive motor vehicle
Both fine and deprivation of the right to drive motor vehicle

questions.text: What is the sanction for a driver who organizes or participates in an unauthorized races on public roads:

answers.text: Only a fine
Only deprivation of the right to drive motor vehicle
Both fine and deprivation of the right to drive motor vehicle

questions.text: What is the sanction for a driver who uses public roads for purposes other than the official purposes the roads are intended for:

answers.text: Only a fine
Only deprivation of the right to drive motor vehicle
Both fine and deprivation of the right to drive motor vehicle

questions.text: If the control authorities confiscate the registration plates of a motor vehicle, it should be transferred to a storage site:

answers.text: Within 2 hours upon establishment of the offense
Within 12 hours upon establishment of the offense
Within 24 hours upon establishment of the offense
